TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 隐匿薹草 ( 原变种) yin ni tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Terminal male spike rather short, lower than adjacent female spike, lowermost female spike not basal. Utricles shortly beaked at apex.
treatment.distribution: ● Mountain slopes, forests, gully sides. Anhui (Langya Shan), Jiangsu.
